title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async/await.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; identical API surface to JS client, supports streaming, embeddings, custom modelfiles.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, multi-user, model manager.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompts and utilities.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repository for building RAG apps with Ollama and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with Ollama models in servers.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with streaming replies.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI Mac app that wraps Ollama for native UI interactions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing an async client for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama as LLM, chat and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, delete, streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, multi-line prompts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine via VS-Code extension.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components for pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-driven recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, Docker Compose stacks, GPU tweaks.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and development shells with CUDA/rocm support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU/GPU) and compose examples for dev, production, and multi-GPU setups.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling, PVC, and ingress.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio, serde, streaming support and examples.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from Ollama OpenAPI spec; chat, generate, pull, push, delete.

title: ollama-node
summary: npm package wrapping the official JS client; 70k weekly downloads, zero runtime dependencies.

title: ollama-py
summary: PyPI package for the official Python client; 200k monthly downloads, supports 3.8+.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot bringing local LLMs to servers with slash commands, moderation, and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private, local LLM queries inside workspaces.
